When a friend shares VERSE PLAY with you, enter their suggested nickname in the Suggested Nickname field below and you\'ll both 3 songs use voucher.
If an invited friend purchases a subscription, you\'ll both still receive a both 3 songs use voucher.
All rewards for invitations and the act of inviting can be earned up to 10 times, with no rewards available after the 11th time.
Even if an invited member leaves and rejoins, they can\'t earn more than 10 referral rewards.

string.name: membership_notice2
string.Data:
Enjoy a cost-free Voucher and Unconstrained
All services available Time Voucher to!
Meet the member benefits prepared by VERSE PLAY.

string.name: membership_footer
string.Data:
- Time Voucher that allows you to use the benefits granted to each voucher for a specified period only.

- A song voucher allows you to use the song accompaniment as many times as the number indicated on the voucher.

- When you cancel payments, we process the cancelation in accordance with Google Play Store\'s guideline.

- You can check your history of payments in Google Play Store.

- When you are subscribed, your subscription is transferable when you switch your phone or to a different operating system. Please let us know by contacting us at verseplay.com if you have any issues.

※ All voucher can be purchased additionally while holding, and period voucher are used first, then song voucher are exhausted in order.

string.name: membership_tj_footer

Address: 8th floor of Sangam IT Tower, 434, World Cup Buk-ro, Mapo-gu, Seoul
Email: cs@verseplay.com
